sentences.en: As our technological powers grow, the portability and flexibility of our computer hardware grows, too.
sentences.cn: 随着我们的技术力量不断增强, 计算机硬件的便携性和灵活性也不断增加.

sentences.en: E 5 bIlEtI; 9 pRrtE ` bIlEtI / n [ U ] : I bought it for its portability, not its appearance.
sentences.cn: 我是图其轻便才买的, 并不是因为样子 好看.

sentences.en: It has stronger portability, easy to transplant, modify, servicing and upgrade.
sentences.cn: 具有较强的可移植性, 易于修改 、 维护和升级.

sentences.en: Lua's portability is archived by using only ANSI C code.
sentences.cn: lua的轻便性通过仅使用ansic达成.

sentences.en: Portability to other ( non - GNU ) architectures and tools is desirable.
sentences.cn: 有这些工具,这样它能使用 非 GNU包.

sentences.en: Portability: The best of the lot, but still not what It'should be.
sentences.cn: 移植性: 最好的, 但仍未达到它本应达到的水平.

sentences.en: Soft and durable material designed for maximum portability.
Some of the advantages of lens stereoscopes are compactness, simplicity and ready portability.
sentences.cn: 透镜式立体镜的一些优点是坚固 、 简单、轻便.

sentences.en: System uses C language program and shown good readability and portability.
sentences.cn: 系统采用C语言编程,可读性和可移植性强.

sentences.en: The advantages of e - books include portability, accessibility, and superior index capabilities.
sentences.cn: 电子书籍的优点包括轻便 、 易于得到和出众的索引功能.

sentences.en: The instrument is characterized by it compactness and portability.
sentences.cn: 这台仪器的特点是结构精巧,携带方便.

sentences.en: The instrument is characterized by its compactness and portability.
sentences.cn: 这个仪器的特征是体积小,便于携带.

sentences.en: The priorities are conformance to the standard and portability.
sentences.cn: 首先是与标准的一致性和可移植性.

sentences.en: This way of implementing IP has characteristics of simplicity and portability.
sentences.cn: 该实现方法具有简洁、代码可移植性强等特点.

sentences.en: X clients also have a high degree of portability.
sentences.cn: 客户端同样具有高度的可移植性.

words.tran_cn: 手提的，便携式的；轻便的
